Happy: ^Hi ! Are you new here ? I've never seen someome like you before!
^Some old man sent me to save this world
Continuation1: ^No way, you're the hero from another world ?!
^Oh wow! What an honour to meet you!
Continuation: ^By the way, I'm Restie! I'm a local here, and I've explore the world before!
^I'm willing to accompany you and act as a guide.
^That is, if you let me follow you. Pretty please ?
yes: ^Yay! I knew you would agree to my small request! Let me pack my stuff and I will meet you at the next floor!
